missions: :tada: %M was invited to MC on Fact iN Star! They made %C. Fans sent a coffee truck, but their manager didn't allow them to go. :confused:
%M made a fun banner to encourage Orbits to vote. They were harassed on Twitter. Collect %C.
%M filmed an earring CF! Collect %C. BlockBerry Creative took the other 99%.
%M picked the pockets of BlockBerry Creative, returning %C to its rightful owner.
%M sold a card on Heekki for %C.
Orbits sent a birthday gift to %M containing %C.
